kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM PTXTOTAL
kpi_info.use: The maximum Rel99 downlink power value value during the measurement period. UPDATED:When the PtxTotal value received from the BTS is larger than the previous maximum value of the measurement period. If HSDPA is enabled in the cell, this counter is based on PtxNonHSDPA power. If HSUPA is enabled in the cell, this counter is based on PtxNonHSPA power.
